repnme.cdata!: Yemen Arab Republic - Second Highway Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Highway Project will
            compromise: (a) construction with supervision of the Taiz-km
            64 (63 km) road to primary standards; and (b) continuation
            of technical assistance to the Highway Authority for a
            period of two years, to increase efficiency and
            effectiveness in highway planning, construction, maintenance
            and administration.
